CustomField.description: Hidden field (updated by workflow) used as part of Is_Active formula field; this allows volunteers with prior status value of candidate and current status of approved to maintain active status until volunteer assignment starts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Hidden field (updated by workflow) used as part of Is_Active formula field; this allows volunteers with prior status value of candidate and current status of approved to maintain active status until volunteer assignment starts.
CustomField.label: Prior Status Value
